elements.text: You're in the middle of a conversation with friends when you struggle to recall the name of a movie. It's uncomfortable to experience these lapses in memory, leaving you wondering if something more concerning is happening. Despite your discomfort, you look around at your friends and remember that there are people in your life that are...

elements.name: Forgetting Movie Title_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
